verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , Michael Cohen , [V: has] split with the legal team that has shepherded him through a criminal investigation that included a high - profile FBI raid , a source familiar with the change said Wednesday .

President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , Michael Cohen , has split with [ARG0: the legal team] [R-ARG0: that] has [V: shepherded] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: through a criminal investigation that included a high - profile FBI raid] , a source familiar with the change said Wednesday .

President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , Michael Cohen , has split with the legal team that has shepherded him through [ARG2: a criminal investigation] [R-ARG2: that] [V: included] [ARG1: a high - profile FBI raid] , a source familiar with the change said Wednesday .

[ARG1: President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , Michael Cohen , has split with the legal team that has shepherded him through a criminal investigation that included a high - profile FBI raid] , [ARG0: a source familiar with the change] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] .
